alert.note: Alert for Jewell; Mitchell (Kansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Hastings (North Central Kansas and South Central Nebraska)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 16 at 1:15PM CDT by NWS Hastings
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of northeastern Mitchell and southeastern Jewell Counties through 145 PM CDT... At 114 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Courtland to near Jewell. Movement was southeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Simpson, Randall and Scottsville. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
